text: Matheus Diogo Desevinka de Oliveira (born 10 June 2002), also known as Alemão, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a forward for Operário Ferroviário. == Career statistics == === Club === Club Season League State League Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Operário Ferroviário 2020 Série B 0 0 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2 0 Career total 0 0 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2 0 ; Notes == References == Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Operário Ferroviário Esporte Clube players
